title: MyParcel.com API Specification
description:
**Introduction**
This is the API reference for MyParcel.com implementing the [Swagger specification](https://swagger.io/specification) according to [JSON API](http://jsonapi.org) conventions.
For more information visit our [API documentation](https://docs.myparcel.com).
**Units**
Some attributes in the API have values in one of the following units:
  • Currency: cents where applicable (eg. EUR, GBP, USD), otherwise the basic unit (eg. JPY, NOK)
  • Distances: meters
  • Dimensions: millimeters
  • Volumes: liters (dm3)
  • Weights: grams
